review: Once I got it out of the (not exactly) "frustration-free" packaging, it was super-easy to add to my system. It fired right up, works great & is impressively fast. The new software seems to have eliminated the issues mentioned in earlier reviews. A simple Install instruction is the only documentation included in the box; the User Guide resides at Amazon to read or download. I would recommend. (Amazon Prime membership adds greatly to the features.)
